info.name: OptyShop API
info.description:
Complete API collection for OptyShop - Smart Optical E-Commerce & Simulation System

## Authentication Strategy

### Website (Public) - No Auth Required
- **Auth**: Register (customer/admin with ALLOW_ADMIN_REGISTRATION), Login (customer/admin), Refresh Token
- **Products & Categories**: All GET endpoints
- **Simulations**: All calculation endpoints (PD, lens thickness, recommendations, etc.)
- **Marketing Content**: Case studies, blog, jobs (GET only)
- **Forms**: Configs and submissions (GET configs, POST submissions)
- **CMS**: Banners (/api/banners), Campaigns (/api/campaigns), FAQs (/api/faqs), Pages (/api/pages/:slug), Testimonials (/api/cms/testimonials)
- **Coupons**: Apply coupon (/api/coupons/apply)
- **Health**: /health, /api

### Customer (Authenticated) - `Authorization: Bearer {{access_token}}`
- **Auth**: Get Current User, Update Profile, Change Password, Logout
- **Cart**: All endpoints
- **Orders**: Create, List, Get by ID, Cancel (customer actions)
- **Prescriptions**: All CRUD operations (customer's own prescriptions)

### Admin (Authenticated) - `Authorization: Bearer {{admin_token}}`
- **Auth**: Get Current User, Update Profile, Change Password, Logout (same endpoints as customer, uses admin_token)
- **User Management**: Create User (customer/admin), Get All Users, Update User
- **Admin Dashboard**: All /api/admin/* endpoints (dashboard, products, categories, frame-sizes, lens-types, lens-coatings, orders, coupons, campaigns, banners, blog-posts, faqs, pages)
- **Orders**: Update status, refund, assign technician
- **Prescriptions**: Validate, verify
- **Simulations**: Config, VTO assets, VTO configs
- **CMS**: Testimonials CRUD (/api/cms/testimonials)
- **Analytics**: All /api/analytics/* endpoints
- **Overview**: /api/overview

## User Registration
- **Customer Registration**: POST /api/auth/register with role="customer" (default)
- **Admin Registration (Testing)**: POST /api/auth/register with role="admin" - Only works if ALLOW_ADMIN_REGISTRATION=true in .env
- **Admin User Creation (Production)**: POST /api/admin/users - Recommended way to create admin users

request.description: Register a new customer account. Role defaults to 'customer' if not provided. Admin role registration requires ALLOW_ADMIN_REGISTRATION=true in environment.

⚠️ WARNING: Admin registration only works if ALLOW_ADMIN_REGISTRATION=true in .env file. For production, use POST /api/admin/users instead. This endpoint will return 403 error if admin registration is disabled.
Login for any user (customer or admin). Returns access_token and refreshToken.
Login for admin users. Use the returned token as {{admin_token}} for admin endpoints.
Get all lens configuration options for a product including prescription lens types, thickness materials, thickness options, treatments, and colors.
Get all prescription lens types (Distance Vision, Near Vision, Progressive) with their variants and colors.

{
  "firstName": "John",

  "email": "john.doe@example.com",

  "resumeCv": "https://example.com/resume.pdf",

  "whyJoinMessage": "I am passionate about optical technology and would love to join Fittingbox. I have extensive experience in digital commerce and product management...",
  "jobId": 102
}

request.description: Request access credentials for the platform. Requires email, first name, last name, and phone number.

formdata.description: Array of selected solutions as JSON string

formdata.value: I need help with virtual try-on integration

formdata.description: Up to 5 files, 100MB max per file

request.description: Submit a support request with optional attachments. Supports up to 5 files, 100MB max per file. Solutions concerned should be an array of solution IDs.

body.raw:
{
  "email": "user@example.com",
  "firstName": "John",
  "lastName": "Doe",
  "phoneNumber": "+1 234 567 8900",
  "solutionsConcerned": ["virtual-try-on", "digital-frames"],
  "message": "I need help with virtual try-on integration. Please provide detailed instructions."
}

request.description: Submit a support request without attachments. Use formdata mode if you need to upload files.

{
  "product_id": 89,

  },

  "treatment_ids": [1, 2],
  "photochromic_color_id": 1,
  "prescription_sun_color_id": null,
  "lens_index": 1.61,

  "card_number": "1234567890123456",
  "cardholder_name": "John Doe",
  "expiry_date": "12/25",
  "cvv": "123"
}

request.description:
Add item to cart with full lens configuration including prescription data, thickness options, treatments, and colors.

**Product Information (Required):**
- `product_id`: Product ID to add to cart
- `quantity`: Quantity (default: 1)

**Lens Configuration (Required for prescription lenses):**
- `lens_type`: Lens type - "distance_vision", "near_vision", or "progressive"
- `prescription_data`: Prescription object with:
  - `pd`: Pupillary Distance (required)
  - `od`: Right Eye object with `sph`, `cyl`, `axis` (required)
  - `os`: Left Eye object with `sph`, `cyl`, `axis` (required)
  - `pd_right`: Right PD (optional, for progressive)
  - `h`: Height (optional, for progressive)
  - `year_of_birth`: Year of birth (optional, for progressive)
- `progressive_variant_id`: Progressive variant ID (required if lens_type is "progressive")
- `lens_thickness_material_id`: Thickness material ID (required)
- `lens_thickness_option_id`: Thickness option ID (required)
- `treatment_ids`: Array of treatment IDs (optional)
- `photochromic_color_id`: Photochromic color ID (optional, if photochromic treatment selected)
- `prescription_sun_color_id`: Prescription sun color ID (optional, if prescription sun selected)

**Legacy Fields (Optional - for backward compatibility):**
- `lens_index`: Lens index value
- `lens_coating`: Single lens coating
- `lens_coatings`: Array of lens coatings
- `prescription_id`: Prescription ID if applicable

**Coupon Code (Optional):**
- `coupon_code`: Coupon code to automatically apply (e.g., "SAVE10")

**Shipping Information (Optional - triggers admin email notification):**
- `first_name`, `last_name`, `email`, `phone`, `address`, `city`, `zip_code`, `country`

**Payment Information (Optional - triggers admin email notification):**
- `card_number`, `cardholder_name`, `expiry_date`, `cvv`

**Note:** The system automatically calculates the total price including all add-ons (progressive variants, thickness materials, treatments, colors).

query.description: Filter by status: pending, processing, completed, failed, cancelled, refunded

request.description: Get all transactions for the authenticated user. Can filter by status, type, and orderId.
Get a specific transaction by ID. Users can only access their own transactions.
Create a Stripe payment intent for an order. Returns client_secret for frontend Stripe integration. If amount is not provided, uses order total.
Confirm a payment intent after frontend Stripe.js confirmation. Updates transaction and order status.
Get the current status of a payment intent from Stripe. Users can only access their own payment intents.
Get current admin user profile. Uses same endpoint as customer but requires admin token.
Update admin profile information.
Change admin password.
Logout admin user and invalidate refresh token.

request.description: Create a new customer user. Role defaults to 'customer' if not provided.
Create a new admin user. Only existing admins can create admin users. This is the recommended way to create admin accounts in production.

request.description: Get all jobs (including inactive ones) with application counts. Admin only.
Get a specific job by ID with all applications. Admin only.

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Senior Optometrist",
  "department": "Clinical",
  "location": "New York, NY",
  "description": "We are looking for an experienced optometrist to join our team.",
  "requirements": [
    "Doctor of Optometry (OD) degree",
    "State license to practice optometry",
    "3+ years of clinical experience",
    "Strong communication skills"
  ],
  "apply_url": "https://careers.example.com/apply",
  "is_active": true
}

request.description: Create a new job posting. Slug is auto-generated from title if not provided. Requirements can be an array (will be converted to JSON string). Admin only.
Update an existing job. Only provided fields will be updated. Requirements can be an array or JSON string. Admin only.
Delete a job posting. This will also delete all associated job applications. Admin only.

query.description: Filter by status: pending, accepted, rejected

request.description: Get all job applications. Can filter by status (pending, accepted, rejected) and job_id. Admin only.
Get a specific job application by ID with job details. Admin only.
Accept a job application. Updates status to 'accepted' and records review timestamp. Optional notes can be included. Admin only.
Reject a job application. Updates status to 'rejected' and records review timestamp. Optional notes can be included. Admin only.
Update job application status to pending, accepted, or rejected. Optional notes can be included. Admin only.
Delete a job application permanently. Admin only.

Create a partial or full refund for a completed payment transaction. If amount is omitted, creates a full refund. Reason options: requested_by_customer, duplicate, fraudulent. Admin only.
Create a full refund by omitting the amount field. Automatically updates order payment_status to 'refunded' if full refund. Admin only.
